home_message: Welcome to @viz_awards_bot, which will allow you to receive new rewards.
enter_login: Enter the login(s) of the accounts you want to subscribe to.
subscribes_list: a List of your subscriptions (login with unsub to unsubscribe):
unsubscribed: You have unsubscribed from the user
not_subscription: You were not subscribed to this user or the list of subscriptions is empty.
subscription_added: You have successfully subscribed to the following users:
help_text:
Almost all commands are executed via buttons. Only unsubscribe via unsub login
Are the buttons gone? Click on the bot's keyboard button or type /start.
If you have any questions or problems, write to the chat @dpos_space or personal @denis_skripnik
